QuestData.Title: The Pinnacle of Learning
QuestData.Description: This is so exciting! What's exciting you might ask? Well THIS is of course!$B$BTime to trial... time for YOU to trial. So many challenges to overcome, so much learning to be done. You learning about trials. Me learning about you.$B$BSo now, off you go. To my Arcane Pinnacle. I will meet you there of course, because I'm quite everywhere.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to the Image of Archmage Xylem at the base of the Arcane Pinnacle.
QuestData.RewardText: Here so soon! Lovely trip I hope. Not too nauseous or anything?$B$BThere will be much running and much jumping, so a settled stomach is of great practicality.
